storyInfo: Yato and Noir Corne encounter infected creatures in the mountain cave, and after using explosives to make their escape, they decide to track down the Rathalos. In the village, the headman argues with a certain villager while the old hunter heads deep into the forest.

attributes.content: Incoming—Three 'o clock!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Watch out, above you!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That was close...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's too many of them! Why are there infected creatures down here?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: All these years and you still haven't broken that habit of asking pointless questions.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: None of these pests should be allowed to go any further. I can't imagine what would happen to the village if they broke free.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: There's more coming! On your right!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: —Gah, my blade! Curses, it's becoming even more dull from the sheer numbers we're dealing with.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We have to stop them from coming... If I'm not wrong, there are still some pretty powerful Originium bombs in my bag from our last mission; they can be remotely detonated.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Just gotta think of a way to trigger one without blowing up us too...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: That ventilation shaft.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It opens up into the inner walls of the cave, so we can use a bomb to blow open the covering and give us an escape route.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: After we're out, we can then quickly detonate the bombs below and cause a cave-in to trap them in... It's definitely feasible.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But the explosion will also weaken the cave's structure, so we'll have limited time to escape. We'll have to be fast.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll go plant the explosives, but I'll need someone to block the infected creatures, can you handle that?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Why even ask? I'll hold them off, go set them up.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Be careful.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey, I'm right here! Don't even think of looking anywhere else!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Quickly now... Alright! Set up complete!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Top bomb ready for detonation!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It opened up... Damage within expectations.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You head up first! I'll keep them at bay here!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, too dangerous. You'd probably end up getting buried alive.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Just listen to me for once, or one of them might slip past.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Fine, then you follow my instructions.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm up! Corne, evacuate immediately!
attributes.name: Yato
Noir Corne
attributes.content: I'm coming, hup—

attributes.name: Noir Corne
attributes.content: Ah!
What's the matter?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The ladder broke...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What? How?! Chikushou!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Calm down, Yato! I'm fine!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Stay calm, stay calm, let me think... Right! I have an idea!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Position your shield between yourself and the bomb, then detonate it and use the force of the shockwave to launch yourself up!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll definitely catch you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Get ready!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Jump!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright—I've got you!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Get—up—here—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: My body—I'm fine! That was perfect!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Corne... You should think about going on a diet.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Guess I'll ask Hibiscus for ideas when we get back.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So are we in the forest?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Smithy, over here! The two long-horned people meownaged to escape!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mew escaped!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: How do you guys always just pop up out of nowhere?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Those chunks of meat were deliberately placed to lure something out from the cave, and we were almost certainly the targets.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But we managed to escape, so their plan should have failed.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Could it have been the villager who gave us the cave's location?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: It doesn't matter who did it. We managed to at least block the cave entrance for now, so it's going to be difficult for the headman to make any further moves against us, and I doubt he intends to destroy his own village.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If the source of Oripathy and the Rathalos are both connected to the cave, then the most direct solution would be to... find out where the cave goes.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Based on its trajectory, it probably ends somewhere within this mountain range, but the exact location will be hard to determine.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What if we looked for the Rathalos instead?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The cave's condition... implies it's been in there before, at the very least, and it might even be at the endpoint you're talking about.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, that's very likely.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Considering that returning to the village will only put us in a sticky situation, there's only one path left for us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: We head deeper into the forest to find the Rathalos.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait just a meowment!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mew just went through a thrilling crisis, and are about to embark on an exciting journey chasing a Rathalos. A Felyne's life truly never pawses!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: So furst! We have to fill up our stomachs! Come enjoy the uniqueness of Felyne cuisine!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Ain't these just leftovers?!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mew know nothing, the taste has changed not one bit!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Fine... I'm craving some meat, so give me a piece.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Me too.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ecological Research team! Onward!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: New meowterials! Furward!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: (chewing)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: The Rathalos... will have to wait.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ritou, give me one good reason why you led them to the cave.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It's simple. Didn't they tell you they were going to deal with that monster? I simply created the perfect conditions for them.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Do you understand what would happen if outsiders found out about our secret?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Of course, of course. Even your niece who only comes back once in a blue moon made such a ruckus when she found out.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: If a company familiar with Originium like Rhodes Island found out, the consequences would be unthinkable.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: So are you ready to handle said consequences?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: They will die down there.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Think about it carefully, Headman. We're both former hunters. I've laid out the bait, and as we both know, beasts are most tempted by the scent of blood.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: They'll encounter that monster long before they discover our secret and— Bam! The battle begins.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: If they're weak, the monster will take care of them for us, and we won't have to worry about any consequences.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: And if by some chance they can take care of the monster, then wouldn't that also be a win for us? Threat successfully eliminated.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: I had some people wait for them to enter, and follow after a short while.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Surely they'll be weak and injured after fighting the monster, so if we want to dispose of them, that would be our best opportunity.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: No matter how it ends up, we benefit.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: You have clearly put a lot of thought into this.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: And of course, whichever way it goes... it'll be better than you sealing the cave off and stubbornly concealing everything.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Oh, don't look so serious. I knew you might be concerned about it, so I just helped you out a little, that's all.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: After all, Akira is no longer with us, so I'm your right-hand man.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Headman, it's a disaster! Someone blew up the cave at the back of the village!
attributes.name: Nervous Villager

attributes.content: The entrance... has been blocked off by rubble.
attributes.name: Nervous Villager

attributes.content: I understand, bring some men with you to clean up the debris and re-open the cave.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: You can go now.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Ritou, was this also part of your brilliant plan?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Oh? This was indeed outside my calculations.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: But since the cave was blown up, I can't imagine they survived the aftermath, so they probably died along with the monster. No matter.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: What you've done today...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I will weigh the pros and cons for the village and decide whether to hold you accountable for your actions later.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: However, for now I'll send a search party to make sure they stay silent.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Works out nicely then, doesn't it? Well, I'll be heading back. There are still quite a few bills I need to go through.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: See yourself out.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Akira, you were right...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The leaves are falling.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So autumn is already here...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Let's go, Akira.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau
